snippet: After three weeks, little has changed in a patch of forest on Staten Island. On a recent visit, colder temperatures afforded a closer look at the sluggish insects.
abstract: After three weeks, little has changed in a patch of forest on Staten Island. On a recent visit, colder temperatures afforded a closer look at the sluggish insects.

headline.main: After a Night of Rain, a Gloomy Scene
headline.print_headline: A Lazy Day for Some, but for a Bee, a Hunt
